clinical_study.brief_title: A Control Study to Evaluate The Efficacy And Safety of Ozone-therapy in Chronic Hepatitis B
clinical_study.official_title: Medical Ozone Versus Conventional Interferon-α Treatment of Patients With Chronic Hepatitis B —A Control Study to Evaluate The Efficacy And Safety of Ozone-therapy in Chronic Hepatitis B

lead_sponsor.agency: Nanfang Hospital of Southern Medical University

clinical_study.source: Nanfang Hospital of Southern Medical University

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to investigate the efficacy and safety of medical ozone in treatment of chronic hepatitis B patients.

detailed_description.textblock: Total of 439 patients with chronic hepatitis B were divided according to patients' intention into two arms. 173 patients in arm I were treated with medical ozone therapy with humares which was made in Germany for at least 12 weeks.266 patients in arm II were treated with conventional interferon-α for at least 24 weeks.Patients in both groups were followed-up for 24 weeks.Virology response, biochemistry response and hepatitis B viral serological response will be studied at 12 weeks after the treatment, at the end of treatment and after 24 weeks of follow-up.

primary_outcome.description: To demonstrate the percentage of patients achieving HBV DNA＜1000copies/mL

secondary_outcome.description: Percentage of patients with HBeAg loss and HBeAg seroconversion in patients with HBeAg positive at baseline.

intervention.description: Medical ozone therapy with instrument made in Germany Patients in this group will receive autohemotherapy treatment. First month: ozone concentration: 20µg ~40µg /ml;The second month: 30µg/ml × 100ml oxygen- ozone gas × 100 ml blood;The third month: 20µg/ml × 100ml oxygen- ozone gas× 100 ml blood.
intervention.other_name: ozone instrument made in Germany: Humares

intervention.description: Patients in the conventional interferon-α treatment group received subcutaneouslly injection of 5 million units of conventional interferon-α in three times per week for at least 24 weeks.

overall_official.affiliation: Nanfang Hospital of Southern Medical University
